Name: Garden Delight
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Tonic Water
Instructions: Place two long slices of cucumber into ice-filled glass. Add melon liqueur and gin and stir. TOP with tonic water and stir again.
Review: Slightly sweet, light, fruity and summery.
History: Created in 2014 by Manuel Terron, Midori Global Brand ambassador.
Garnish: Gently roll muddler over rosemary sprig to release aromas before adding to glass.
